articles.title: Mass. school districts cancel classes through Friday amid power outages, snow cleanup
articles.description:
Schools along Cape Cod and in southeastern Massachusetts are battling power outages, poor road conditions, and snow removal challenges following Monday’s blizzard.

articles.title: Man threatens another bus passenger with a gun in East Boston, police say
articles.description:
